00058 static void initData(ModifierData *md)
00059 {
00060     MeshDeformModifierData *mmd = (MeshDeformModifierData*) md;
00061 
00062     mmd->gridsize= 5;
00063 }
00064 
00065 static void freeData(ModifierData *md)
00066 {
00067     MeshDeformModifierData *mmd = (MeshDeformModifierData*) md;
00068 
00069     if (mmd->bindinfluences) MEM_freeN(mmd->bindinfluences);
00070     if (mmd->bindoffsets) MEM_freeN(mmd->bindoffsets);
00071     if (mmd->bindcagecos) MEM_freeN(mmd->bindcagecos);
00072     if (mmd->dyngrid) MEM_freeN(mmd->dyngrid);
00073     if (mmd->dyninfluences) MEM_freeN(mmd->dyninfluences);
00074     if (mmd->dynverts) MEM_freeN(mmd->dynverts);
00075     if (mmd->bindweights) MEM_freeN(mmd->bindweights); /* deprecated */
00076     if (mmd->bindcos) MEM_freeN(mmd->bindcos); /* deprecated */
00077 }

00079 static void copyData(ModifierData *md, ModifierData *target)
00080 {
00081     MeshDeformModifierData *mmd = (MeshDeformModifierData*) md;
00082     MeshDeformModifierData *tmmd = (MeshDeformModifierData*) target;
00083 
00084     tmmd->gridsize = mmd->gridsize;
00085     tmmd->object = mmd->object;
00086 }

00088 static CustomDataMask requiredDataMask(Object *UNUSED(ob), ModifierData *md)
00089 {   
00090     MeshDeformModifierData *mmd = (MeshDeformModifierData *)md;
00091     CustomDataMask dataMask = 0;
00092 
00093     /* ask for vertexgroups if we need them */
00094     if (mmd->defgrp_name[0]) dataMask |= CD_MASK_MDEFORMVERT;
00095 
00096     return dataMask;
00097 }

00099 static int isDisabled(ModifierData *md, int UNUSED(useRenderParams))
00100 {
00101     MeshDeformModifierData *mmd = (MeshDeformModifierData*) md;
00102 
00103     return !mmd->object;
00104 }

00116 static void updateDepgraph(ModifierData *md, DagForest *forest,
00117                         struct Scene *UNUSED(scene),
00118                         Object *UNUSED(ob),
00119                         DagNode *obNode)
00120 {
00121     MeshDeformModifierData *mmd = (MeshDeformModifierData*) md;
00122 
00123     if (mmd->object) {
00124         DagNode *curNode = dag_get_node(forest, mmd->object);
00125 
00126         dag_add_relation(forest, curNode, obNode,
00127                  DAG_RL_DATA_DATA|DAG_RL_OB_DATA|DAG_RL_DATA_OB|DAG_RL_OB_OB,
00128                  "Mesh Deform Modifier");
00129     }
00130 }
00131 
00132 static float meshdeform_dynamic_bind(MeshDeformModifierData *mmd, float (*dco)[3], float *vec)
00133 {
00134     MDefCell *cell;
00135     MDefInfluence *inf;
00136     float gridvec[3], dvec[3], ivec[3], co[3], wx, wy, wz;
00137     float weight, cageweight, totweight, *cageco;
00138     int i, j, a, x, y, z, size;
00139 
00140     zero_v3(co);
00141     totweight= 0.0f;
00142     size= mmd->dyngridsize;
00143 
00144     for (i=0; i<3; i++) {
00145         gridvec[i]= (vec[i] - mmd->dyncellmin[i] - mmd->dyncellwidth*0.5f)/mmd->dyncellwidth;
00146         ivec[i]= (int)gridvec[i];
00147         dvec[i]= gridvec[i] - ivec[i];
00148     }
00149 
00150     for (i=0; i<8; i++) {
00151         if (i & 1) { x= ivec[0]+1; wx= dvec[0]; }
00152         else { x= ivec[0]; wx= 1.0f-dvec[0]; } 
00153 
00154         if (i & 2) { y= ivec[1]+1; wy= dvec[1]; }
00155         else { y= ivec[1]; wy= 1.0f-dvec[1]; } 
00156 
00157         if (i & 4) { z= ivec[2]+1; wz= dvec[2]; }
00158         else { z= ivec[2]; wz= 1.0f-dvec[2]; } 
00159 
00160         CLAMP(x, 0, size-1);
00161         CLAMP(y, 0, size-1);
00162         CLAMP(z, 0, size-1);
00163 
00164         a= x + y*size + z*size*size;
00165         weight= wx*wy*wz;
00166 
00167         cell= &mmd->dyngrid[a];
00168         inf= mmd->dyninfluences + cell->offset;
00169         for (j=0; j<cell->totinfluence; j++, inf++) {
00170             cageco= dco[inf->vertex];
00171             cageweight= weight*inf->weight;
00172             co[0] += cageweight*cageco[0];
00173             co[1] += cageweight*cageco[1];
00174             co[2] += cageweight*cageco[2];
00175             totweight += cageweight;
00176         }
00177     }
00178 
00179     copy_v3_v3(vec, co);
00180 
00181     return totweight;
00182 }
00183 
00184 static void meshdeformModifier_do(
00185       ModifierData *md, Object *ob, DerivedMesh *dm,
00186       float (*vertexCos)[3], int numVerts)
00187 {
00188     MeshDeformModifierData *mmd = (MeshDeformModifierData*) md;
00189     struct Mesh *me= (mmd->object)? mmd->object->data: NULL;
00190     BMEditMesh *em = me ? me->edit_btmesh : NULL;
00191     DerivedMesh *tmpdm, *cagedm;
00192     MDeformVert *dvert = NULL;
00193     MDefInfluence *influences;
00194     int *offsets;
00195     float imat[4][4], cagemat[4][4], iobmat[4][4], icagemat[3][3], cmat[4][4];
00196     float weight, totweight, fac, co[3], (*dco)[3], (*bindcagecos)[3];
00197     int a, b, totvert, totcagevert, defgrp_index;
00198     float (*cagecos)[3];
00199 
00200     if (!mmd->object || (!mmd->bindcagecos && !mmd->bindfunc))
00201         return;
00202     
00203     /* get cage derivedmesh */
00204     if (em) {
00205         tmpdm= editbmesh_get_derived_cage_and_final(md->scene, ob, em, &cagedm, 0);
00206         if (tmpdm)
00207             tmpdm->release(tmpdm);
00208     }
00209     else
00210         cagedm= mmd->object->derivedFinal;
00211 
00212     /* if we don't have one computed, use derivedmesh from data
00213      * without any modifiers */
00214     if (!cagedm) {
00215         cagedm= get_dm(mmd->object, NULL, NULL, NULL, 0);
00216         if (cagedm)
00217             cagedm->needsFree= 1;
00218     }
00219     
00220     if (!cagedm) {
00221         modifier_setError(md, "%s", TIP_("Can't get mesh from cage object."));
00222         return;
00223     }
00224 
00225     /* compute matrices to go in and out of cage object space */
00226     invert_m4_m4(imat, mmd->object->obmat);
00227     mult_m4_m4m4(cagemat, imat, ob->obmat);
00228     mult_m4_m4m4(cmat, mmd->bindmat, cagemat);
00229     invert_m4_m4(iobmat, cmat);
00230     copy_m3_m4(icagemat, iobmat);
00231 
00232     /* bind weights if needed */
00233     if (!mmd->bindcagecos) {
00234         static int recursive = 0;
00235 
00236         /* progress bar redraw can make this recursive .. */
00237         if (!recursive) {
00238             recursive = 1;
00239             mmd->bindfunc(md->scene, mmd, (float*)vertexCos, numVerts, cagemat);
00240             recursive = 0;
00241         }
00242     }
00243 
00244     /* verify we have compatible weights */
00245     totvert= numVerts;
00246     totcagevert= cagedm->getNumVerts(cagedm);
00247 
00248     if (mmd->totvert != totvert) {
00249         modifier_setError(md, TIP_("Verts changed from %d to %d."), mmd->totvert, totvert);
00250         cagedm->release(cagedm);
00251         return;
00252     }
00253     else if (mmd->totcagevert != totcagevert) {
00254         modifier_setError(md, TIP_("Cage verts changed from %d to %d."), mmd->totcagevert, totcagevert);
00255         cagedm->release(cagedm);
00256         return;
00257     }
00258     else if (mmd->bindcagecos == NULL) {
00259         modifier_setError(md, "%s", TIP_("Bind data missing."));
00260         cagedm->release(cagedm);
00261         return;
00262     }
00263 
00264     cagecos= MEM_callocN(sizeof(*cagecos)*totcagevert, "meshdeformModifier vertCos");
00265 
00266     /* setup deformation data */
00267     cagedm->getVertCos(cagedm, cagecos);
00268     influences= mmd->bindinfluences;
00269     offsets= mmd->bindoffsets;
00270     bindcagecos= (float(*)[3])mmd->bindcagecos;
00271 
00272     dco= MEM_callocN(sizeof(*dco)*totcagevert, "MDefDco");
00273     for (a=0; a<totcagevert; a++) {
00274         /* get cage vertex in world space with binding transform */
00275         copy_v3_v3(co, cagecos[a]);
00276 
00277         if (G.rt != 527) {
00278             mul_m4_v3(mmd->bindmat, co);
00279             /* compute difference with world space bind coord */
00280             sub_v3_v3v3(dco[a], co, bindcagecos[a]);
00281         }
00282         else
00283             copy_v3_v3(dco[a], co);
00284     }
00285 
00286     modifier_get_vgroup(ob, dm, mmd->defgrp_name, &dvert, &defgrp_index);
00287 
00288     /* do deformation */
00289     fac= 1.0f;
00290 
00291     for (b=0; b<totvert; b++) {
00292         if (mmd->flag & MOD_MDEF_DYNAMIC_BIND)
00293             if (!mmd->dynverts[b])
00294                 continue;
00295 
00296         if (dvert) {
00297             fac= defvert_find_weight(&dvert[b], defgrp_index);
00298 
00299             if (mmd->flag & MOD_MDEF_INVERT_VGROUP) {
00300                 fac= 1.0f - fac;
00301             }
00302 
00303             if (fac <= 0.0f) {
00304                 continue;
00305             }
00306         }
00307 
00308         if (mmd->flag & MOD_MDEF_DYNAMIC_BIND) {
00309             /* transform coordinate into cage's local space */
00310             mul_v3_m4v3(co, cagemat, vertexCos[b]);
00311             totweight= meshdeform_dynamic_bind(mmd, dco, co);
00312         }
00313         else {
00314             totweight= 0.0f;
00315             zero_v3(co);
00316 
00317             for (a=offsets[b]; a<offsets[b+1]; a++) {
00318                 weight= influences[a].weight;
00319                 madd_v3_v3fl(co, dco[influences[a].vertex], weight);
00320                 totweight += weight;
00321             }
00322         }
00323 
00324         if (totweight > 0.0f) {
00325             mul_v3_fl(co, fac/totweight);
00326             mul_m3_v3(icagemat, co);
00327             if (G.rt != 527)
00328                 add_v3_v3(vertexCos[b], co);
00329             else
00330                 copy_v3_v3(vertexCos[b], co);
00331         }
00332     }
00333 
00334     /* release cage derivedmesh */
00335     MEM_freeN(dco);
00336     MEM_freeN(cagecos);
00337     cagedm->release(cagedm);
00338 }
00339 
00340 static void deformVerts(ModifierData *md, Object *ob,
00341                         DerivedMesh *derivedData,
00342                         float (*vertexCos)[3],
00343                         int numVerts,
00344                         int UNUSED(useRenderParams),
00345                         int UNUSED(isFinalCalc))
00346 {
00347     DerivedMesh *dm= get_dm(ob, NULL, derivedData, NULL, 0);
00348 
00349     modifier_vgroup_cache(md, vertexCos); /* if next modifier needs original vertices */
00350     
00351     meshdeformModifier_do(md, ob, dm, vertexCos, numVerts);
00352 
00353     if (dm && dm != derivedData)
00354         dm->release(dm);
00355 }
00356 
00357 static void deformVertsEM(ModifierData *md, Object *ob,
00358                         struct BMEditMesh *UNUSED(editData),
00359                         DerivedMesh *derivedData,
00360                         float (*vertexCos)[3],
00361                         int numVerts)
00362 {
00363     DerivedMesh *dm= get_dm(ob, NULL, derivedData, NULL, 0);
00364 
00365     meshdeformModifier_do(md, ob, dm, vertexCos, numVerts);
00366 
00367     if (dm && dm != derivedData)
00368         dm->release(dm);
00369 }
00370 
00371 #define MESHDEFORM_MIN_INFLUENCE 0.00001f
00372 
00373 void modifier_mdef_compact_influences(ModifierData *md)
00374 {
00375     MeshDeformModifierData *mmd= (MeshDeformModifierData*)md;
00376     float weight, *weights, totweight;
00377     int totinfluence, totvert, totcagevert, a, b;
00378 
00379     weights= mmd->bindweights;
00380     if (!weights)
00381         return;
00382     
00383     totvert= mmd->totvert;
00384     totcagevert= mmd->totcagevert;
00385 
00386     /* count number of influences above threshold */
00387     for (b=0; b<totvert; b++) {
00388         for (a=0; a<totcagevert; a++) {
00389             weight= weights[a + b*totcagevert];
00390 
00391             if (weight > MESHDEFORM_MIN_INFLUENCE)
00392                 mmd->totinfluence++;
00393         }
00394     }
00395 
00396     /* allocate bind influences */
00397     mmd->bindinfluences= MEM_callocN(sizeof(MDefInfluence)*mmd->totinfluence, "MDefBindInfluence");
00398     mmd->bindoffsets= MEM_callocN(sizeof(int)*(totvert+1), "MDefBindOffset");
00399 
00400     /* write influences */
00401     totinfluence= 0;
00402 
00403     for (b=0; b<totvert; b++) {
00404         mmd->bindoffsets[b]= totinfluence;
00405         totweight= 0.0f;
00406 
00407         /* sum total weight */
00408         for (a=0; a<totcagevert; a++) {
00409             weight= weights[a + b*totcagevert];
00410 
00411             if (weight > MESHDEFORM_MIN_INFLUENCE)
00412                 totweight += weight;
00413         }
00414 
00415         /* assign weights normalized */
00416         for (a=0; a<totcagevert; a++) {
00417             weight= weights[a + b*totcagevert];
00418 
00419             if (weight > MESHDEFORM_MIN_INFLUENCE) {
00420                 mmd->bindinfluences[totinfluence].weight= weight/totweight;
00421                 mmd->bindinfluences[totinfluence].vertex= a;
00422                 totinfluence++;
00423             }
00424         }
00425     }
00426 
00427     mmd->bindoffsets[b]= totinfluence;
00428     
00429     /* free */
00430     MEM_freeN(mmd->bindweights);
00431     mmd->bindweights= NULL;
00432 }

00459 };
